result.eng: I was at the station too early.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag an stáisiún róluath
result.orig: Bhí mé ag an stáisiún róluath
result.html: Bhí mé ag an stáisiún róluathI was at the station too early.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag an stáisiún róluaṫI was at the station too early.

result.html: Go luath ar maidinEarly in the morning.
result.ponchtml: Go luaṫ ar maidinEarly in the morning.

result.eng: I am going to die soon.
result.ga: Tá mé chun bás a fháil go luath
result.orig: Tá mé chun bás a fháil go luath
result.html: Tá mé chun bás a fháil go luathI am going to die soon.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ċun bás a ḟáil go luaṫI am going to die soon.

result.eng: They have promised that the work will be finished soon.
result.ga: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeidh an obair críochnaithe go luath
result.orig: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeidh an obair críochnaithe go luath
result.html: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeidh an obair críochnaithe go luathThey have promised that the work will be finished soon.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeiḋ an obair críoċnaiṫe go luaṫThey have promised that the work will be finished soon.

result.eng: We are planning to launch the product soon.
result.ga: Tá sé i gceist againn an táirge a sheoladh go luath
result.orig: Tá sé i gceist againn an táirge a sheoladh go luath
result.html: Tá sé i gceist againn an táirge a sheoladh go luathWe are planning to launch the product soon.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé i gceist againn an táirge a ẛeolaḋ go luaṫWe are planning to launch the product soon.

result.ga: An itheann tú lón go luath
result.orig: An itheann tú lón go luath
result.html: An itheann tú lón go luathDo you eat lunch early?
result.ponchtml: An iṫeann tú lón go luaṫDo you eat lunch early?

result.eng: I'm sorry if I'm too early.
result.ga: Tá brón orm má tá mé róluath
result.orig: Tá brón orm má tá mé róluath
result.html: Tá brón orm má tá mé róluathI'm sorry if I'm too early.
result.ponchtml: Tá brón orm má tá mé róluaṫI'm sorry if I'm too early.

result.eng: You are not too early. Come in.
result.html: Níl tú róluath Tar isteachYou are not too early. Come in.
result.ponchtml: Níl tú róluaṫ Tar isteaċYou are not too early. Come in.

result.eng: Well, I hope that you will feel better soon.
result.ga: Bhuel tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luath
result.orig: Bhuel tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luath
result.html: Bhuel tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luathWell, I hope that you will feel better soon.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuel tá súil agam go mbeiḋ biseaċ ort go luaṫWell, I hope that you will feel better soon.

result.eng: I hope you get better soon.

result.orig: Tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luath
result.html: Tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luathI hope you get better soon.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam go mbeiḋ biseaċ ort go luaṫI hope you get better soon.

result.html: Níl sé sin róluathThat's not too early.
result.ponchtml: Níl sé sin róluaṫThat's not too early.

result.html: An éiríonn tú go luathDo you get up early?
result.ponchtml: An éiríonn tú go luaṫDo you get up early?

result.eng: It's a little early for someone like you to be interested in playing cards.
result.ga: Tá sé buille luath ag do mhacasamhail a bheith tógtha le himirt chardaí
result.orig: Tá sé buille luath ag do mhacasamhail a bheith tógtha le himirt chardaí
